SELECT t.id,t.sign_time signTime,t.sign_flag signFlag,t2.school_time,t2.`name` AS courseName,t3.`name` teacherName FROM t_course_sign t JOIN t_student_course t1 ON t.student_course_id=t1.id JOIN t_course t2 ON t1.course_id=t2.id JOIN t_teacher t3 ON t2.teacher_id=t3.id WHERE t1.student_id=#{studentId}
AND t2.id=#{courseId}
